title: VegHeadz
overview: VegHeadz is a captivating series that takes vegetables from the side dish to center stage. Hosted by two-time MasterChef winner Chef Pino Di Cerbo, each episode explores various themes, such as seasons or colours, that inspire four tasty plant-based plates. Featuring a grain of the day, VegHeadz reimagines what you can do with fresh produce and allows audiences to discover delightful dishes fit for any table.
